items.headline: Gold has a shot at $5,000 if investors rekindle this popular trade
items.summary_en: It has been more than two weeks since gold prices notched record highs, but the debasement trade that has played a key role in the precious metal’s rally this year is alive and well.

items.headline: Trade wars are dying down, but the U.S. economy is still licking its wounds
items.summary_en: The trade wars have died down, but they have not disappeared — and that has left a cloud over the U.S. economy that’s unlikely to go away soon.

items.headline: Meta’s stock is the new ‘Magnificent Seven’ doormat. Should you buy the dip?

items.headline: Airbnb suggests consumers are starting to feel better about taking vacations. Here’s why profits could still take a hit.
items.summary_en: Vacation-rental platform Airbnb Inc. on Thursday said demand held up through October and forecast fourth-quarter sales that were above expectations, but the company said spending on new services and political battles would cut into profits.
